institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 4 (Human resource development support project tasks)
contents: Article 4 (Work of human resource development support project) The work of the human resource development support project performed by the Corporation is as follows: 1. Support for learning organization of small and medium-sized enterprises, 2. Support for field-tailored systematic training (Small and Medium Business Training Support Center) , company-customized field training), 3. Certification as an excellent human resource development institution, 4. Other work related to human resource development within the company
